name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Ray of Jewelry【#ホロ0期生ライブ2024】 [AUu9pSkkgaY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

subtitles.original: アザミナ
subtitles.english: Azamina

subtitles.original: ひらり ふらり 彷徨ってく 白い夢は もうやめた
subtitles.english: Fluttering and swaying, wandering along, I’m done with that white dream.

subtitles.original: 私ずっと知ってたの 匂いに誘われて落ちてく
subtitles.english: I’ve known it all along, lured by the scent and falling.

subtitles.original: 与えられた役目を尋ねることが怖くて
subtitles.english: Afraid to ask about the role I was given.

subtitles.original: 流れる日々の答えに濁したのは心だけ
subtitles.english: In the answers of passing days, only my heart was clouded.

subtitles.original: 定められた箱の中 味気ない寂しさが
subtitles.english: Inside the predestined box, a tasteless loneliness.

subtitles.original: 少しずつ侵食してた 漂う地も知らぬまま
subtitles.english: It was eroding me little by little, without me even knowing where I was drifting.

subtitles.original: しまい隠したはずだった ただの戯言
subtitles.english: It was supposed to be tucked away, just mere nonsense.

subtitles.original: 分かってる 奥に潜む その目で見たまぎれもない衝動
subtitles.english: I know, lurking deep inside, is that unmistakable impulse you saw with those eyes.

subtitles.original: ひらり ゆらりとんでいける 迷い惑い 閉じ込めた
subtitles.english: Fluttering and swaying, I can fly away, trapping my hesitation and confusion.

subtitles.original: あなたはもう 離さないで やがて嘘と知っても
subtitles.english: Don’t let go of me anymore, even if you eventually find out it was a lie.

subtitles.original: ひらり ふらり 彷徨ってく 白い夢は もうやめた
subtitles.english: Fluttering and swaying, wandering along, I’m done with that white dream.

subtitles.original: 私ずっと知ってたの 匂いに誘われて落ちてく
subtitles.english: I’ve known it all along, lured by the scent and falling.

subtitles.original: まとわりつく言葉だけ 何の意味もないくせに
subtitles.english: Only the words that cling to me, even though they have no meaning.

subtitles.original: 背負わされてる重さに 潰れそうでもがいてた
subtitles.english: Struggling as I’m about to be crushed by the weight I’m forced to carry.

subtitles.original: 気付かないふりしていたの 交わすすべてを
subtitles.english: I was pretending not to notice everything we exchanged.

subtitles.original: 囁いた我に染まる 覚悟と甘さの代償 それだけ
subtitles.english: That’s all—the price of the determination and sweetness that stains the self I whispered.

subtitles.original: ひらり ゆらり舞い降りてく 迷い惑い 脱ぎ捨てて
subtitles.english: Fluttering and swaying, I dance down, casting off my hesitation and confusion.

subtitles.original: あなたはもう 離さないで やがて嘘と知っても
subtitles.english: Don’t let go of me anymore, even if you eventually find out it was a lie.

subtitles.original: ひらり ふらり落とされてく 白い夢は もうやめた
subtitles.english: Fluttering and swaying, being dropped down, I’m done with that white dream.

subtitles.original: 私きっと戻らない 匂いに誘われて落ちてく
subtitles.english: I surely won’t go back, lured by the scent and falling.

subtitles.original: ひらり ゆらりとんでいける 迷い惑い 閉じ込めた
subtitles.english: Fluttering and swaying, I can fly away, trapping my hesitation and confusion.

subtitles.original: あなたはもう 離さないで やがて嘘と知っても
subtitles.english: Don’t let go of me anymore, even if you eventually find out it was a lie.

subtitles.original: ひらり ふらり 彷徨ってく
subtitles.english: Fluttering and swaying, wandering along.

subtitles.original: 白い夢は もうやめた
subtitles.english: I’m done with that white dream.

subtitles.original: 私ずっと知ってたの 匂いに誘われて落ちてく
subtitles.english: I’ve known it all along, lured by the scent and falling.

subtitles.original: いのち(2024 ver.)
subtitles.english: Inochi (2024 ver.)

subtitles.original: 息をしている だから生きている
subtitles.english: I am breathing, therefore I am alive.

subtitles.original: 何度もずっと言葉を尽くしてきたんだ
subtitles.english: I have used all my words over and over again.

subtitles.original: 息をしているように見えている
subtitles.english: It seems as though I am breathing.

subtitles.original: 綻び出す私にとっての何か
subtitles.english: Something that begins to fray within me.

subtitles.original: 鼓動がドクドクしている
subtitles.english: My heart is thumping.

subtitles.original: ここはいつも変わらずに
subtitles.english: This place remains unchanged, as always.

subtitles.original: 急かし続ける音一つの命
subtitles.english: A single life, a sound that keeps on rushing.

subtitles.original: 最後まで私のこと
subtitles.english: Until the very end, about me...
